questions.name: hoisting
choices: Moving all declarations to the bottom of the scope
Moving all declarations to the top of the scope
Moving all assignments to the top of the scope
Moving all functions to a separate scope
questions.correctAnswer: Moving all declarations to the top of the scope

questions.name: closure
questions.message: What is a closure in JavaScript?
choices: A way to close the browser window
A function that has access to variables in its outer scope
A way to end a loop
A method to close database connections
questions.correctAnswer: A function that has access to variables in its outer scope

questions.name: equality
questions.message: What is the difference between == and === in JavaScript?
choices: == performs type coercion while === checks value and type
questions.correctAnswer: == performs type coercion while === checks value and type
